alfredsnippet.snippet:
#!/bin/sh

if [ -z $1 ]; then
	# Find files that haven't been marked with any resolution
	find . -type f \( -name '*.avi' -or -name '*.m4v' -or -name '*.mkv' -or -name '*.mp4' \) | egrep -v "(\[\d+p)"
else
	find . -type f \( -name '*.avi' -or -name '*.m4v' -or -name '*.mkv' -or -name '*.mp4' \) | grep "$1"
fi
alfredsnippet.name: Find media files with resolution
